attributes.action: Ask Sainsbury's to reconsider their decision not to open a store in Herne Bay.
attributes.additional_details: The new road systems are in place for the entrance to the store and a new foot bridge has been created for foot traffic.  All this going nowhere now!!
attributes.background: The planned store has taken over a year to build, has caused traffic delays, dust & dirt but we justified all that as we looked forward to a new store plus a fuel station, all of which are needed in Herne Bay. If they pull out the area will look unsightly where the work has been going on.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an operational decision for Sainsbury's.
